data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: Tech-driven solutions to scale your business

data.name: Service1_Description
data.value: In‑depth understanding of your business needs, aligned to budget

data.name: Service1_BackText
data.value: We’ll define & compare multiple tailored IT strategies so you can choose the best fit.

data.name: Service2_Description
data.value: You bring a clear business idea and strategy; we analyze modules, write technical specs, build a delivery pipeline, define all tasks, and share plans via Jira, Trello, or Azure DevOps.

data.name: Service2_BackText
data.value: From modules to milestones—get a complete, transparent plan ready for development.

data.name: Service3_Description
data.value: Build desktop applications, scalable backend services, modern web & cross‑platform mobile apps, integrate existing software, implement cloud services, and apply AI where beneficial.

data.name: Service3_BackText
data.value: Full‑stack, end‑to‑end development tailored to your needs, with seamless integration & scaling.

data.name: Service4_Description
data.value: Ongoing support for all delivered apps, four levels of service, on‑demand solution reviews, and updated designs with implementation roadmaps.

data.name: Service4_BackText
data.value: Keep your systems running smoothly and evolve with confidence using our flexible support tiers.

data.name: AboutParagraph1
data.value: At Logyx.tech, we’re passionate about turning your vision into reality. With years of experience in IT strategy, solution design, and end‑to‑end development, our team partners with you to craft tailored software solutions that scale.

data.name: AboutParagraph2
data.value: From the initial brainstorming session to long‑term support and future planning, we’re with you every step of the way—bringing clarity to complexity and innovation to every project.

data.name: TeamMember1_Description
data.value: Lead Developer with 10+ years of experience crafting scalable .NET and Blazor applications.

data.name: TeamMember2_Description
data.value: Project Manager who keeps everything on track, coordinating between stakeholders and dev teams.

data.name: TeamMember3_Description
data.value: UX/UI Designer focused on creating intuitive and accessible interfaces that delight users.

data.name: TeamMember4_Description
data.value: Cloud Architect and DevOps specialist, ensuring your solutions are robust and production‑ready.

data.name: TeamMember5_Description
data.value: AI/ML Engineer bringing intelligent automation and data‑driven insights into every project.

data.name: TeamMember6_Description
data.value: Quality Assurance lead, passionate about delivering bug‑free and high‑performance software.

data.name: ThankYouMessage
data.value: Thanks for reaching out! We’ll be in touch soon.
